subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Wise Dan, a 5-year-old gelding, won the Breeders’ Cup Mile in course-record time and two other Grade I turf stakes.
snippet: Wise Dan, a 5-year-old gelding, won the Breeders’ Cup Mile in course-record time and two other Grade I turf stakes.
